com.pedroalmir.athena.core.algorithm
Interface Algorithm

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
All Known Subinterfaces:
SingularAlgorithm
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAlgorithm, FuzzyAlgorithm, NSGAIIAlgorithm
public interface Algorithm
extends java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.Cloneable

Base interface defining all Algorithm classes.

Author:
Pedro Almir

Obtain the best current solution.

getIterations

int getIterations()
Returns the number of iterations that have been performed by the algorithm.

Returns:
The number of iterations.

setOptimizationProblem

void setOptimizationProblem(Problem problem)
Set the optimization Problem to be solved.

By default, the problem is nullnull. It is necessary to set the optimization problem before calling performInitialisation().

Parameters:
problem - an implementation of the Problem interface.

getOptimizationProblem

Problem getOptimizationProblem()
Get the specified Problem.

Returns:
The specified Problem.

isFinished

Verify if is finished

Returns:
true if is finished
